tool_description:
LayURL is an URL Shortener. Features with custom-naming, password-protected, private-access, QR code generated, expiry-with-date, expiry-by-view-count, etc. Public stats available.

Read more: https://layurl.com/developer.html

- An InnoByT.com Project.
name: LayURL - LayeredURL Shortener
title: LayURL - LayeredURL Shortener

api_list.name: Write API

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The url you want to shrink

optional_parameters.name: uses
optional_parameters.description: Number of uses for the url

optional_parameters.name: expire
optional_parameters.description: date in format MM/DD/YYYY to expire url

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Adds a signature to track your application

api_list.name: Simple API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://layurl.p.rapidapi.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "layurl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://layurl.p.rapidapi.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "layurl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Read API

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the url you want to access
